entry.tran: 开明的;开通的;有见识的
entry.def: If you describe someone or their attitudes as enlightened, you mean that they have sensible, modern attitudes and ways of dealing with things.

example.ex: Enlightened companies include its human resources in their estimation of the firm's worth.
example.tran: 有见识的公司将人力资源包括在公司价值评估中。
